name: RouteLocationNamedRaw
description: Route Location that can infer the necessary params based on the name.
value:
interface RouteLocationNamedRaw extends RouteQueryAndHash, LocationAsRelativeRaw, RouteLocationOptions {
}

members.name: replace
members.description: Replace the entry in the history instead of pushing a new entry

members.name: force
members.description:
Triggers the navigation even if the location is the same as the current one.
Note this will also add a new entry to the history unless `replace: true`
is passed.

members.name: state
members.description:
State to save using the History API. This cannot contain any reactive
values and some primitives like Symbols are forbidden. More info at
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/History/state
